works.description:
Hello to whom in charge. Is it possible
to  
remove the entire blog rather than just pages? This blog specialized in  
distributing illegal PC game download. It's not just my games, but several
 
other game makers. What do I need to do in order for me to remove them?  
It's very counter productive to ask to remove content one by one. If you  
like proofs of what materials have been stolen, I can provide several
